tasks.label: Docker: Build Frontend
tasks.command: (cd .. && docker run -v $(pwd):/src -it ghcjs:lts-9.21 stack --stack-yaml=frontend/stack.yaml build --fast && docker commit $(docker ps -l -q) ghcjs:lts-9.21)

tasks.label: Docker: Test Frontend
tasks.command: (cd .. && docker run -v $(pwd):/src -it ghcjs:lts-9.21 stack --stack-yaml=frontend/stack.yaml test frontend --fast && docker commit $(docker ps -l -q) ghcjs:lts-9.21)

tasks.label: Docker: Watch Test Frontend
tasks.command: (cd .. && docker run -v $(pwd):/src -it ghcjs:lts-9.21 stack --stack-yaml=frontend/stack.yaml test frontend --fast --haddock-deps --file-watch && docker commit $(docker ps -l -q) ghcjs:lts-9.21)
